name: Ken Miles
review: Its out there, most people don't know it, but it is. The perfect lap.

name: Sydney Burnet
review: Everything I've experienced on this site has been excpetional. Bad boys for life!

name: Stringer Bell
review: This here game is more than the rep you carry, the corner you hold. You gotta be fierce, I know that.

name: Aldous Snow
review: What you did was very spiteful, but it was also very brave and very honest and I respect you for doing that.

name: Sara Wayland
review: I've got two jobs. I've discovered that you have to work twice as hard when it's honest

name: John Creasy
review: There is no such thing as tough. There is trained and untrained. Now which are you?

name: Happy Gilmore
review: Just tap it in. Just tap it in. Give it a little tappy. Tap Tap Taparoo.

name: Mike Tyson
review: There's nothing more deadly or more proficient then a happy fighter.

name: O-Ren Ishii
review: You may not be able to fight like a Samurai, but you can at least die like a Samurai.
